metadata.title: CVE-2019-14880 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Moodle versions 3.7 before 3.7.3, 3.6 before3.6.7, 3.5 before 3.5.9 and earlier. OAuth 2 providers who do not verifyusers' email address changes require additional verification during sign-upto reduce the risk of account compromise.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
